pages.text: Days and nights are now longer, days are 30 minutes, nights are 20 minutes for a total of 50 minutes per full day!$(br2)Under the sky, you're safe from mobs as they won't spawn. Except phantoms. Make sure to sleep once in a while to keep them away.
You can always sleep to pass the night. And make a hammock to pass the day away. Ars Nouveau has a ritual to skip the day as well. [what is that called?]
